content: That's really helpful. I already have some tables and tablecloths, so that'll help reduce the cost. For the Summer Fest event, I'll probably aim for a mid-range decoration budget of around $200. I think it'll be worth it to create a visually appealing display that showcases my products. By the way, do you have any tips on how to effectively promote my products on social media? I've been posting regularly, but I'm not sure if I'm doing it right.
